link.title: Hopkins Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

strong.span: May 1, 2020 will be the last day for school at Somerset Independent Schools.
Students should complete NTI Lessons through Lesson #29. Any additional lessons may be completed and turned in but only 1-29 days are required.
The feeding program will continue on the Monday and Thursday delivery schedule through May 14
. Information about summer feeding will be coming soon.

span.b: ***Middle and High School students need to check student email for communications from their teachers.

div.p: The prosperity of the Somerset Independent School District is only possible through the strong partnership between our community, parents, students, and staff. This partnership is based upon the commonalities of high expectations and doing what’s best for our students. The Somerset Independent School District strives to meet the needs of every child in order to ensure our graduates are successful citizens.
